data.text: @Thee_Kyle_Smith Tell us, how can we assist you. Regards.
@Thee_Kyle_Smith Hi, due to security reasons, we kindly ask you to delete this publication, and contact us via DM with your information, in order to be able to assist you. Regards.

data.text: @Joseph_Arc78 Hi, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.
@ctala Carolina, te invitamos a que elimines tus datos personales del mensaje anterior para evitar problemas a futuro. Puedes enviarnos esa información al Dm. Quedamos atentos.
@ctala Hola Carolina, indícanos como podemos ayudarte. Quedamos atentos.

@SamQuam Hello, we are glad to know that you had a good experience with us, we will make sure to share your congratulations to the indicated area. Bear in mind, we would like to manifest that our purpose is to provide a service of excellence, warm and humane. Kind regards.
@jamie328 We have sent you a DM message. Regards.
@jamie328 Look for us as LATAM Airlines, for us, it is not possible to send you a DM if you are not following us or have previously sent us a DM. We stay tuned.
@jamie328 We treat your information responsibly and in accordance with legal requirements. We will be waiting for you to send us the information by DM to assist you with the purchase of the ticket.

@jamie328 To help you, tell us by inbox how you want to buy your ticket (Payment TC or miles), dates, cabin and desired fare. Also, for each passenger (full name, number and type of document, date of birth, telephone number and email) so we can send you a payment link. We stay tuned.

@jamie328 Hello, the web page can be affected by browser history or the cookies, for this reason we ask you to delete them and try one more time or try to use a different browser or device. In case the problem still persists, please write us back attaching a screenshot of the error.

@Catherynn_Stars Hello, please let us know by DM if you already have a Latam reservation code (6 upper letters, no numbers) or ticket number (13 digits), and also confirm the full name of the passenger and your email. Regards.

@Leticiasosa08 Hi, in order to assist you, we ask you to please get in touch with our specialized luggage area via WhatsApp: https://t.co/x60gZpSN01. We apologize for the mishandling of your luggage and be assured that we'll do all possible to assist you through this situation. Regards.

data.text: @Carolin65101866 Hello, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.
@Lynney05 Hi, we've sent you a DM. Regards.

@chaxta Hello, since your case was created, it has been intervened on several occasions by the area in charge, keep in mind that it has not yet been resolved due to the high demand. All your comments have been added to the case. Regards.

@DominikStumpf94 Hello, keep in mind that when the frequent flyer number is not entered in the purchase process, you can enter it in the check-in process or directly at the airport when you approach the Latam counter. Regards.

@GiaFornesi Hello, please send us by DM your origin - destination trip, dates and route, along with the full name of the passenger, email address registered, ID or passport number and contact number to carry out the respective validations.
@bethweinstein Hello, we've sent you a DM. Regards.

@nbonino Hola, con el fin de poder asistirte envíanos al DM el código de reserva, número de ticket y nombre completo del pasajero. Asimismo, si cuentas con un reclamo por tu equipaje, bríndanos el código PIR. Quedamos atentos a tu respuesta.

@Johnnie_Howie_ Some Valid conditions to enter VIP Lounges: you are a LATAM Pass Black Signature member traveling on LATAM. If you are a Black and Platinum member, you can enter when traveling on LATAM. If you are a member of a partnership airline, you must consult directly with them.
@SonOfaKeef En un DM valídanos tus nombres, código de tu reserva, número de reclamo y tus datos de contacto (teléfono y correo). Quedamos atentos.

@SonOfaKeef Hola, para hacer seguimiento o presentar un reclamo de equipaje, el canal regular con el que debes contactarte es nuestro Whatsapp. Puedes hacerlo en el siguiente enlace: https://t.co/DQbHnNWRmq. Saludos.

data.text: @chaxta Hello, we have left all your comments on the case, this is still in process and as soon as there is an update we will contact you via email. Regards.
@CyberTrans2077 Hello, you can find all our offers on this link https://t.co/tq10i8ED6O. Remember that all flights are subject of changes and availability. Regards.

urls.description: Book the best flight deals with LATAM Airlines, the largest flight network in Latin America.

data.text: @SuperCoiudadana Hola Gonzalo, nos comunicamos contigo vía DM. Saludos.
@ccastillo_2209 Esperamos poder asistirte en otra oportunidad. Quedamos atentos ante futuras consultas o requerimientos. Que tengas buen día.

@ccastillo_2209 no es posible localizar tu reserva. Por favor, envíanos los siguientes datos:
- Nombre completo del pasajero.
- Documento de identidad.
- Tipo de Documento.
- Fecha y ruta (ida y retorno). 
- Email de Contacto, mediante un DM(Mensaje Privado). Aguardamos tu respuesta.

@ccastillo_2209 Hola, envíanos el código de reserva (6 letras) y/o número de ticket (13 dígitos); a su vez, el nombre completo de los pasajeros, en caso viajes con otras personas, mediante un DM (Mensaje Privado). Aguardamos tu respuesta. Saludos.
@chaxta We understand your annoyance with the time it has taken to resolve your case, however we continue working with the purpose of providing you with an update as soon as possible. Regards.

@chaxta We have added internal notes regarding your case, we ask you for a little more patience, Your refund case is being worked on. As soon as they have an answer for you, they will let you know through email. Best regards.

@chaxta Hello, we noticed on May 18th, your case was updated, although we know that it has not yet been resolved, we inform you that we continue working to provide you with an answer as soon as possible.
@SuperCoiudadana Te hemos respondido vía DM. Saludos.
@SuperCoiudadana Hola, te hemos respondido por DM. Saludos.

@SuperCoiudadana Hola, entendemos lo que nos comentas y para poder darte una mayor asistencia, envíanos por DM tu código de reserva (6 letras) o número de ticket (13 dígitos) y nombre completo del pasajero a fin de verificar detalles. Quedamos atentos por esa vía.
@lsodre2 [+] Com relação à cortesia do assento, por favor nos informe via DM, o seu CPF. Iremos verificar.

@lsodre2 [+] Sentimos muito que não tenha aprovado essa opção. Agradecemos pelo interesse em expor a sua opinião, pois valorizamos muito o feedback dos nossos clientes. Saiba que reportaremos para conhecimento das áreas envolvidas, visando a melhoria dos nossos serviços. [+]

@lsodre2 Olá Leonardo, em voos domésticos oferecemos opções de snacks doces, snacks salgados e bebidas (água, café, suco e refrigerante). Essas opções serão oferecidas de acordo com a duração e horário do voo (manhã, tarde e noite) e cabine (Premium Economy ou Economy). [+]

data.text: @bethweinstein Due to the closure of the Jaén airport (JAE) in Peru, established by the local authority, all operations will be canceled between June 4 and September 3, 2022. This information is subject to change due to measures taken by the authorities governmental. Regards.

@bethweinstein Hi, in order to assist you with your request, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.

@chaxta We know that you have not yet received a response from the specialist area, however, we verify that your case is still under the management of the area and you will receive a response as soon as possible. Regards.

@chaxta At the moment we still do not have any response yet from the specialist area, our team will provide you a solution as soon as they can, now you should only wait since all the required information has been sent by you from the very beginning. Best regards.

@chaxta Your case is still being worked on. We have entered the corresponding notes according to your case. We want to tell you that some cases take longer to resolve than others. As soon as we have more information we will let you know immediately. Regards.
@chaxta Hello, we just left an internal message. Regards.

@chaxta We understand your annoyance with the time it has taken to resolve your case, however we continue working with the purpose of providing you with an update as soon as possible. However, please be advised to reply by using your email through your case 40557333. Regards.

@earth_andrew Hello, to help you in the best way, please let us know your reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers) and full name of the passenger, via DM. We will be waiting for your reply. Greetings.

@bryce_bryce3 Hi, we hope you are doing well, in order to provide you with assistance, please send us by direct message the details of your request. We will be waiting for your reply.

@EyalCap Hello, we are glad to know that you were able to recover your driver's license, for us is very important the safety of our passengers, and it is a pleasure to have been able to help you. Best regards.

data.text: @aileenalon Hi, sometimes our website's performance can be affected by browser’s history. We suggest you to delete the history and/or the cookies on your computer or try to use other browser. If the error persists, send us a screenshot, to evaluate the best way to assist you. Regards.

data.text: @bethweinstein Hi, we hope you are doing well. Please send us via inbox your doubts and concerns to assist you. Regards.
@SentidoComun000 Hola, para brindarte una asistencia más oportuna, te agradecemos nos indiques un idioma (español, inglés o portugués) para comunicarnos. Saludos.

@AmourLazy Hello, we encourage you to submit your concerns about your experience with our in the following link: https://t.co/VZcK4N51r0, and in this way we can take the corresponding actions that allow us to improve our service. Thank you for contacting us. Regards.
@aliciainwdrland Hello, we just left an internal message. Regards.
@KirstenProft Hi, we can not send you a proof of cancellation since this information usually is sent to the email associated to the reservation automatically. Regards.
@kesgyatso Hello, please send us the details of your case by DM, so we can review it and provide you with assistance. We stay tuned.

@tamittoe ¿Por qué comprar una tablet si puedes usar el celular? Mejor viaja por el mundo y disfruta de las mejores experiencias. Conoce tu próximo destino con este #CyberLATAM ✈️😎 aquí: https://t.co/wY9YK1mRzQ

urls.description: Reserva tus pasajes, paquetes turísticos, hoteles, seguros, compra con millas y arriendo de autos. LATAM la aerolínea líder de Chile y Sudamérica.

data.text: @NikkiSama111 Hi, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.
@cigicnt Hello, we just left an internal message. Regards.
@_SPNRUS Hi, please send us via DM more details of your requirement to assist you. Regards.

@aliciainwdrland Hi, please send us via DM the associated travel voucher number, full name of the passenger, type and document number, issuing country, email address and corresponding amount to carry out the respective validations. Regards.

@roseppppponicho Hi, in order to assist you please send us by private message the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 numbers), and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.
@_PauCorrea Hola, te enviamos un DM. Saludos.
@Todossomosanim1 Hola, escríbenos tu consulta al DM. Saludos

@cigicnt Hello Cigi, we apologize that you didn't received an answer yet, your case number : 40485351, i still open, we will stay tuned for any changes in the status or any information in the case to informing to you.
@JoaoTravelPR Hello, we can assist you through this means, please send us your request to our DM. We will stay tuned.
@Habiba_Nabih Hello, we have sent you a DM. Regards.

@Habiba_Nabih Hello, we understand your annoyance with the time it has taken to resolve your case, however we continue working with the purpose of providing you with an update as soon as possible. Regards.
@prematwit We have sent you a DM. Regards.

@prematwit Hi, we ask you to please delete the cookies and browser history or try to use a different browser or device (preferably a computer). In case the problem still persists, please DM us a screenshot of the error in order to check this further. Regards.
@canalenokingpin Hola, para brindarte un asistencia más oportuna, te agradecemos nos escribas por DM y nos indiques un idioma (español, inglés o portugués) para comunicarnos. Quedamos atentos.
@MarciaSchuck1 Tu caso sé está evaluando con el fin de brindarte una respuesta formal, te pedimos por favor estar atenta a tu correo. Saludos.

@MarciaSchuck1 Hola, hemos validado y cuando una devolución se ingresa el sistema no permite realizar la anulación, tu solicitud aún se encuentra en proceso tu solicitud Gracias por escribirnos. Saludos.
@spacemeasles Hello, we can assist you through this means, send us a DM with your request. Regards.
@vachon_patrice Hi, please send us via DM the associated booking reference and full name of the passenger to carry out the respective validations. We will stay tuned for your information. Regards.

@CliftonB Hi, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters, no numbers) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name, in order to check this further. We will be waiting for your response.
@isendrai Hello, please tell us by DM the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger. We will review and provide you with options. We stay tuned.

@Habiba_Nabih Hello, please provide us by direct message with your Latam reservation code (6 upper letters, no numbers) or ticket number (13 digits), along with the full name of the passenger and also your email. Regards.
@elvis51962536 Hi, we suggest you to stay tuned in case we have nonstop flights in the future. At the time the options are the ones available in our website. Best regards.
@whodunit68 Hello, we just left an internal message. Regards.
@rheilaohara Hi, in order to assist you, please DM us the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.

@LauVioletaMx In this case, we ask you to please get in touch with our specialized luggage area via WhatsApp: https://t.co/EDnRz8Hc5Q. Rest assured that we'll do all possible to assist you through this situation. Regards.

data.text: @LauVioletaMx Hello, if you’re still at the airport, talk to our LATAM staff in the baggage claim area and make a claim with your passport or ID, boarding pass, and the bill of the checked baggage purchased. Regards.

data.text: @CLPEsq Hello, in order to provide you with assistance it is necessary that sent us the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger. Bear in mind, if your ticket was issue by a travel agency you must contact them to get the exception.
@shruti_tuti29 Hello, please send us via DM the passenger's full name, email, origin/destination, dates and flight numbers. We'll stay tuned.

We are working to improve your future experience!
Between May 17 and 23, our LATAM Pass platform will be undergoing improvements, so some services will not be available. More details here: https://t.co/CInMDjS0qm ✈😉. https://t.co/RbuFShj2BN
@MoiseCarrillO Hola Moises, para brindarte mayor información envíanos un DM con el código de reserva (6 letras) y nombre completo. Quedamos atentos.
@sinchij Correcto, la tarifa promo o basic dependiendo la ruta del viaje no permite equipaje en cabina ni bodega como se detalla aquí: https://t.co/9ye4eWCAWt. Saludos.

urls.title: Equipaje de cabina | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Conoce qué es un artículo personal y lo puedes llevar contigo en cabina, ya sea abajo del asiento o en el compartimento superior.

data.text: @sinchij Recuerda que con la tarifa Light, Plus o Top, puedes llevar 1 equipaje de mano (equipaje en cabina). Asimismo, no es posible brindarte un precio específico ya que dependerá de la tarifa y anticipación de tu compra; también puedes obtenerlo comprando un asiento LATAM+. Saludos.

@sinchij Hola, para asistirte envíanos por DM el código de reserva (6 letras) o número de ticket (13 dígitos) junto con el nombre completo del pasajero y correo electrónico asociado. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.
@doublewidesfly Hi, by this means we can also assist you. Just let us know by DM the details of your inquiry. We look forward to hearing from you.
@Martacifu2004 Para brindarte una asistencia más oportuna, te agradecemos nos indiques un idioma (español o inglés) para comunicarnos. Saludos.
